categories: Category:Events during the High Republic Era

nodes.text: The Drengir crisis was a crisis that developed on the frontier of the galaxy during the High Republic Era, caused by the sentient carnivorous plants known as the Drengir. After the Drengir were encountered on the Amaxine station following the Great Hyperspace Disaster, they began to wake up across the galaxy. The beings undertook a number of attacks across the frontier, including one on the Starlight Beacon space station, with entire worlds becoming overrun by the Drengir. The Jedi of Starlight, under Marshal Avar Kriss, were tasked with handling the situation.
